headline: Tech Weekly Podcast: Gesture control technologies
text: This week we discuss gesture control technologies and how this form of interaction with computers is set to give birth to a new user-interface experience. Charles Arthur meets Assaf Gad from Israeli software company Pointgrab to discuss their hand gesture recognition technology and Aleks Krotoski talks to creative technologist Evan Grant about the artistic possibilities of these technological developments.  Aleks also meets games developer Linden Vongasthorn from Hide & Seek and, along with Guardian games writer Keith Stuart, they discuss why gaming is at the forefront of gesture control technologies. Finally, the Guardian telecommunications correspondent Juliette Garside joins Aleks to discuss Apple's problems with maps and it's iO6 software update.
